JobFullDesc: At Bristol Myers Squibb, we are inspired by a single vision – transforming patients’ lives through science. In oncology, hematology, immunology and cardiovascular disease – and one of the most diverse and promising pipelines in the industry – each of our passionate colleagues contribute to innovations that drive meaningful change. We bring a human touch to every treatment we pioneer. Join us and make a difference.Description:This role will report to the Executive Director, WW Oncology Pricing Strategy as part of the WW Pricing & Access Execution Organization.  This role will lead the development of pricing strategies for the Immuno-Oncology portfolio coordinating a cross-functional team to inform and develop these strategies. The Director, Oncology Pricing Strategy will be responsible for developing and adapting the pricing strategy for BMS’ Immuno-Oncology portfolio.   Strategic projects will include evolution of the Opdivo pricing strategy, development of pricing strategies for next generation compounds, combination pricing strategies for one or more IO products and other miscellaneous pricing strategy topics including dosing and formulation changes, fixed ratio combinations and business development opportunities.   Additional responsibilities will include supporting key markets in their implementation of the IO pricing strategy and supporting the pricing impact and ROI for DEX related opportunities.  Strategy development will focus primarily on ex-US markets however partnering with the US pricing team and strategy will be a key activity of the role.Development of pricing strategy will be conducted in close collaboration with the relevant Market Access Strategy leads, pricing and access teams from local markets, Business Insights and Analytics, HEOR, and the WW commercial organization.  The position is cross functional in nature and is part of a highly matrixed organization, working on a wide range of needs and issues from evaluating payer insights to influencing pricing strategies to reviewing and leading the approval of new business cases for in-market opportunities. .  The Director, Oncology Pricing should possess a solid understanding of the current and emerging global Market Access and pricing environment in Oncology Medicines.  Both technical and leadership skills are critical to succeed in this matrix leadership role.The Director, WW Oncology Pricing Strategy responsibilities include:Develop Worldwide Pricing strategy for BMS' in-line and pipeline Oncology Medicines/assets by tumor/indication (e.g. OPDIVO®, YERVOY®, & Pipeline Assets (e.g. IDO, LAG3, & GITR)Work with Commercial, Medical, Business Insights and Analytics teams and local markets to ensure relevant insights obtained to formulate Pricing StrategyPartner with WW pricing execution and key markets  in the execution of pricing strategy including the business case and approval of exceptions to strategyProvide insights into the impact on pricing for DEX opportunities and calculate the ROI associated with the DEX optionsSupport other ad hoc pricing projects as requiredMonitor external environment and synthesize input to inform your strategy. Effectively navigate matrix in order to develop and maintain positive relationships with other functional areas and Market Access colleagues in order to drive alignment,
